term.title: charge-transfer (CT) state

item.text: A state related to the ground state by a charge-transfer transition.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 2223. 'Glossary of terms used in photochemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 2232 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668122223)
